Articles.Content: I've seen this https://x.com/NASASpaceflight/status/1226590712503947264?s=20 concept and wondering if anyone could make a parts pack that works with @benjee10's SOCK?  I really want to see this fly, if possible, but I don't have any mod making experience and I feel like this is one hell of a first mod to make. Just an idea for you Benjee10 or other mod makers, whoever wants to pick this up. :)
